text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <NOTE>11. Bey Herrn Daniel Hag dem Buchbinder sind folgende Bücher, in nachgesetztem Preise zu verkaufen;</NOTE>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justi Lipsii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Epistolarum Centuriae complet</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>apud Plautin.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>1. Gulden 36. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Politicorum Libri</TITLE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Monita</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>8e Exempla politica</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>De Magnirudine Romana</TITLE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>De Constantia</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>ibid.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>fl. 1. xr. 36.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>de Militia Romana cum An. fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>-ibid.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>fl. 1. xr. 30.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Poliorecticon de Machinis, Tormentis, Telis cum An.fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>fl. 1. xr. 12.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>de Amphitheatro</TITLE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>de Amphitheatris extra Romam, cum An.fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>-ibid.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>30. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Dissert. apud Principes Se C.Plinii Pane- Gyricus cum Commentar.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>ibid.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>48. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Opera cum Lipsii Commentariis</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>ibid.</NOTE>
    <PRICE>fl. 3.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>3. Theil</VOLUME>
    <PLACE>Lugd.</PLACE>
    <PRICE>fl. 7. xr. 12.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Gotthard Heideggers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kleinere Teutsche Schrifften</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>30. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Delicia Urbis Bernae</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>13. äuf.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Vernunfft-mäßige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, mit Kupfferen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>11. äuf.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Vernunfft-mäßige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, ohne Kupffer</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>4. Batzen.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Milton</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Verlust des Parabieses</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>14. äuf.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Paragone della Pobsia Tragica dtalia conquella di Francia</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>5. Batzen.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Breitingeri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>in Versus obscurciss. Persii diarribe Historico Literaria</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1723.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>1. Batzen.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Discurse der Mahleren</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Theil</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1731.</YEAR>
    <PRICE>16. äuf.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
","number_of_corrections":22,"explanation":"Main corrections applied:
- Added XML declaration and a <NOTE> wrapper for the opening line to make the ITEM structured.
- Separated nested/incorrectly nested <BIBL> elements into individual <BIBL> records (multiple instances).
- Closed all opened tags and ensured each bibliographic item is a self-contained <BIBL> element.
- Unified tag name for monetary amounts to <PRICE> (replaced inconsistent <PRIZE>/<PRICE> usage).
- Moved stray inline text (e.g. 'apud Plautin.', 'ibid.', '-ibid.') into <NOTE> elements when appropriate.
- Escaped ampersands (& -> &) to produce well-formed XML.
- Normalized a few obvious OCR/unicode artifacts in titles to readable approximations (kept original orthography where uncertain).

Total fixes reported above are an approximate count of structural and tag-name corrections (22). If you prefer a different normalization (e.g. keep original escaped sequences or a different tag scheme), tell me and I will adjust."}

parsed.explanation:
Main corrections applied:
- Added XML declaration and a <NOTE> wrapper for the opening line to make the ITEM structured.
- Separated nested/incorrectly nested <BIBL> elements into individual <BIBL> records (multiple instances).
- Closed all opened tags and ensured each bibliographic item is a self-contained <BIBL> element.
- Unified tag name for monetary amounts to <PRICE> (replaced inconsistent <PRIZE>/<PRICE> usage).
- Moved stray inline text (e.g. 'apud Plautin.', 'ibid.', '-ibid.') into <NOTE> elements when appropriate.
- Escaped ampersands (& -> &) to produce well-formed XML.
- Normalized a few obvious OCR/unicode artifacts in titles to readable approximations (kept original orthography where uncertain).

Total fixes reported above are an approximate count of structural and tag-name corrections (22). If you prefer a different normalization (e.g. keep original escaped sequences or a different tag scheme), tell me and I will adjust.
